game.name: The Demon Lord's Daughter and the Tower of Seals
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the wake of the Demon Lord's defeat, his daughter, Lilina, finds herself leading a miserable existence without any of the comforts of the castle she once called home. Now she has to make an honest living while seeking out fabled talismans in an attempt to regain her lost powers!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the wake of the Demon Lord's defeat, his daughter, Lilina, finds herself leading a miserable existence without any of the comforts of the castle she once called home. Now she has to make an honest living while seeking out fabled talismans in an attempt to regain her lost powers!
